data.eml:eml: Description of Enterobius (Colobenterobius) emodensis sp. n. (Nematoda: Oxyuridae) collected from Central Himalayan langur, Semnopithecus schistaceus, in Uttarakhand, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hasegawa, Hideo, Nautiyal, Himani, Sasaki, Mizuki, Huffman, Michael A. (2018): Description of Enterobius (Colobenterobius) emodensis sp. n. (Nematoda: Oxyuridae) collected from Central Himalayan langur, Semnopithecus schistaceus, in Uttarakhand, India. Zootaxa 4514 (1): 65-76, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.1.5
